entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is an elf who died and was being remembered and mourned by his friends.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Dobby's who is present at the funeral.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a friend of Dobby's who is present at the funeral and says 'thanks' to Dobby.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a friend of Dobby's who is present at the funeral and says goodbye to Dobby.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is a friend of Dobby's who speaks on behalf of Harry when he can't say anything else.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a friend of Dobby's who casts a spell to cover the grave with earth.

entities.name: the cottage
entities.description: The cottage is where Harry and his friends are staying.

entities.name: dobby's grave
entities.description: Dobby's grave is the location of the funeral.

entities.name: the wandmaker
entities.description: The Wandmaker is a place that Harry looks around at the end of the passage.

relationships.description: Ron remembers and mourns Dobby's death.
Bill casts a spell to cover Dobby's grave with earth.
Luna speaks on behalf of Harry when he can't say anything else.
